alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 7:35PM EST until December 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Florida, Coastal Nassau, Coastal Duval, Trout River and South Central Duval Counties. In Georgia, Coastal Glynn and Coastal Camden Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River
